page.title: 13THE LOCAL DOCTOR, AYSGARTH
page.content: Our local doctor has been a General Practitioner for 26 years. She has worked in Aysgarth for 5 years. Her area covers the villages of West Burton, West Witton, Walden, Bainbridge , Thoralby & Bishopdale. The doctor is in partnership with her husband and they have about 2400 patients. They take 3 surgeries a day and also go round to all those who cannot come to the surgery. The most common complaints are rheumatism, arthritis, high blood pressure and infections. The doctor thinks that illness and treatment have changed because people are living longer and illnesses of old age are more common.The disadvantage of this area is the distance from the hospital and the isolated position of some farms, but one of the advantages is knowing all the patients.
